item.Q:
Write the character:
to do harm to; to cause trouble to; harm; evil; calamity
item.A:
hài
危害 wēihài to jeopardize; to harm; to endanger

item.Q:
Write the character:
to lift; to hold up; to cite; to enumerate; to act; to raise; to choose; to elect
item.A:
举 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 舉
jǔ
举行 (舉行) jǔxíng to hold (a meeting, ceremony etc)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to follow; to comply with; to allow; surname
item.A:
随 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 隨
suí
随着 (隨著) suízhe along with; in the wake of; following

traditional: 魚
yú
鲤鱼 (鯉魚) lǐyú carp

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to press; to push down; to keep under (control)
2: in the first place; to crush
item.A:
traditional: 壓
1: yā 2: yà
压力 (壓力) yālì pressure 低气压 (低氣壓) dīqìyà low pressure area

item.Q:
Write the character:
good (virtuous); benevolent; well-disposed; good at sth; to improve or perfect
item.A:
善 (strokes unavailable)
shàn
改善 gǎishàn to make better; to improve

item.Q:
Write the character:
still; calm; quiet; not moving
item.A:
traditional: 靜
jìng
静止 (靜止) jìngzhǐ still; stillness

势 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 勢
shì
势力 (勢力) shìli power; (ability to) influence

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: learn by heart; the back of the body
2: carry on ones back
item.A:
背 (strokes unavailable)
1: bèi 2: bēi
背后 (背後) bèihòu behind; at the back; in the rear; behind sb's back 背包 bēibāo knapsack; rucksack; infantry pack; field pack; blanket roll

骂 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 罵
mà
咒骂 (咒罵) zhòumà damn; curse
